text: @SethAbramson .@KTENnews Your station has become so biased to the right that U lie all the time & only report 1 way! @KETK_Bob Brackeen reported the spike in #covid19 was Not caused by trump rally, but even Tulsa health officials said it was! Start honest reporting! U need to represent trueth.
